Map cuBLAS => MAGMA
Utilities » Constants and converters

Convert MAGMA constants to NVIDIA cuBLAS constants. More...

Functions

cublasOperation_t cublas_trans_const (magma_trans_t magma_const)

cublasSideMode_t cublas_side_const (magma_side_t magma_const)
 

Detailed Description

Convert MAGMA constants to NVIDIA cuBLAS constants.

Available if HAVE_CUBLAS was defined when MAGMA was compiled. TODO: we do not currently provide inverse converters (cuBLAS => MAGMA).

Function Documentation

cublasOperation_t cublas_trans_const ( magma_trans_t  magma_const)
Return values
CUBLAS_OP_Nif magma_const = MagmaNoTrans
CUBLAS_OP_Tif magma_const = MagmaTrans
CUBLAS_OP_Cif magma_const = MagmaConjTrans

Return values

CUBLAS_FILL_MODE_LOWERif magma_const = MagmaLower

Return values

CUBLAS_DIAG_UNITif magma_const = MagmaUnit
